name: Kirk Pruhs
content: Kirk Pruhs' Home Page Professor Kirk Pruhs Dept. of Computer Science 210 South Bouquet Street Sennott Square Building, Room 6415 University of Pittsburgh Pittsburgh , PA 15260 Primary Email: kirk@cs.pitt.edu Secondary Email: krp2@pitt.edu Phone : 412-624-8844 Fax : 412-624-8854 Research My research interests are in algorithmic problems related to relational learning, energy as a computational resource, resource management,  scheduling, online optimization, online scheduling, and fair allocation. A reasonably accurate list of publications from DBLP and Google Scholar Vita A Wordle view of my research collaborators and publications from www.wordle.net. Teaching and Education Current Post-Docs Recent Post-Docs Ho-Leung Chan Antonios Antoniadis Michele Scquizzato Peter Kling Ilan Cohen Current PhD Students Max Bender PhD students with graduation year: Jonathan Beaver (Joint with Panos Chysanthis) 2006 Mohamed Aly (Joint with Panos Chysanthis), 2008 Christine Chung 2009 Daniel Cole 2013 Neal Barcelo 2015 Michael Nugent 2015 Alireza Samadian Zakaria, 2021 I am currently, or have recently taught, or will soon teach the following courses: CS 2150 Graduate Algorithms Spring 2025 CS 1511/2110 Theory of Computation Spring 2025 CS 1510/2012 Algorithm Design  Fall 2023 Miscellaneous Links Family Photos My page on the history of the MAPSP scheduling conference Errata for my papers
